physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Admitted with bloody diarrhea and abdominal pain.
Patient presented with acute renal failure and hemolytic anemia; hemoglobin fell to 8.4 g/dL within 48 hours.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Hemoglobin level and renal function improved after 9 days of peritoneal dialysis; however, neurological symptoms developed.
